credentials.title: Connect your ESP Home device
credentials.description: Please provide the IP adress and, optionally, a password for your device.
credentials.connection_timeout: Time out while connecting to device

capabilities.title: Link Homey capabilities
capabilities.nothing_to_map: No supported capabilities have been detected on your ESPhome device
capabilities.description: Link your ESPhome sensors to Homeys capabilities.
capabilities.submit_warning: Are you sure you have all capabilites linked?

welcome.title: ESPhome Wizard
welcome.description: How my magic can assist you?

new_device.title: Connect to the new device
new_device.description: To assist you, I need to connect to your physical device!
new_device.already_exist: I already know a physical device with those IP address and port, please use 'Update an existing physical device' in previous screen or correct your input
new_device.connected: Great, I was able to connect, let's start to use magic
new_device.failed: Connection failed, maybe your input is wrong

update_device.title: Choose an existing device
update_device.description: To assist you, I need you to choose an existing device
update_device.info: To change the IP address, port, encryption key or password, use the dedicated screen
update_device.none: I didn't find any existing physical device, are you sure?
update_device.list: Here is the list of the physical devices I know, please choose one!

conf_main.title: There goes the magic
conf_main.description: I gonna use a lot of magic for you, but first, you need to compose the right spell formula!

virtual_devices.title: List of virtual devices
virtual_devices.none: None yet, create your first one!
virtual_devices.delete_warning: Deletetion of a virtual device can break your flows! Are you sure?
virtual_devices.no_native_capability_alert: Add at least one native capability
virtual_devices.delete_through_settings: You can delete virtual device through their setting screen
virtual_devices.change_name_format: The name you input is not nice, try again!
virtual_devices.name_must_be_changed_alert: Don't forget to change the name!
virtual_devices.native_capability_deleted_warning: This virtual device has an (at least one) existing capability deleted
virtual_devices.delete_existing_native_capability_warnin: Removing this capability can/will break your flows! Are you sure?
virtual_devices.capability_updated_warning: A capability has been updated with new configuration

settings.title: List of settings
settings.info: Seetings are shared for all the virtual device
settings.none: None yet, add your first one!

unbind_native_capabilities.title: List of unbind native capabilities
unbind_native_capabilities.info: It's ok to leave some behind
unbind_native_capabilities.none: All native capabilities have been assigned!

action.label: Choose a virtual device to assign

conf_main.confirm_warning: There are at least one warning (orange), are you sure?

conf_settings.title: There goes the magic
conf_settings.description: I gonna use a lot of magic for you, but first, you need to compose the right spell formula!

settings.port_number_incorrect: Port number should be between 1 and 65535
settings.ip_address_incorrect: Please enter an valid IP address
settings.title: Application settings
settings.log.subtitle: Log configuration
settings.consolere.subtitle: Console.re configuration

list-virtual-devices.title: Manage your virtual devices
list-virtual-devices.loseModification: Your modification(s) will be lost. Are you sure?

list-physical-devices.title: Short list of physical devices
list-physical-devices.help: Unused physical devices will be deleted

list-physical-devices.title: Manage your physical devices
list-physical-devices.cannot-modify: New physical device cannot be modified until they are used

edit-physical-device.loseModification: Your modification(s) will be lost. Are you sure?
edit-physical-device.error-name: Name is required and must be pretty
edit-physical-device.error-name-already-used: This name is already used by another physical device
edit-physical-device.error-ip-address: IP address is required and must have a correct format: 192.168.0.12
edit-physical-device.error-port: Port is required and must have a correct format: 1 to 65535
edit-physical-device.error-ipAddress-and-port-already-used: Those IP address and port are already used by another physical device
edit-physical-device.error-encryption-key: Encryption Key must be a 32-byte base64 encoded string
edit-physical-device.error-encryption-key-and-password-are-ex: Encryption Key and Password are exclusive
edit-physical-device.warning-encryption-key-recommended: Using an encryption key is highly recommended!
edit-physical-device.failed: Failed to connect to new physical device. Try again?
edit-physical-device.timeout: Seems 15 seconds is not enough time to connect. What's wrong?

edit-virtual-device.loseModification: Your modification(s) will be lost. Are you sure?
edit-virtual-device.name: Name
edit-virtual-device.error-name: Name is required and must be pretty
edit-virtual-device.warning-name-already-used: This name is already used by another virtual device in the same zone
edit-virtual-device.warning-capability-title-not-unique: Several capabilities have the same title

new-capability.loseModification: Your modification(s) will be lost. Are you sure?
new-capability.title: New capability

amplifier.label: Amplifier
amplifier.description: Use this device class for audio amplifier devices.

blinds.label: Blinds
blinds.description: Use this device class for blinds, both horizontal and vertical.

button.label: Button
button.description: Use this device class for buttons, such as a remote.

coffeemachine.label: Coffee machine
coffeemachine.description: Use this device class for coffee machines.

curtain.label: Curtains
curtain.description: Use this device class for curtains.

doorbell.label: Doorbell
doorbell.description: Use this device class for doorbells, usually together with the `button` capability.

fan.label: Fan
fan.description: Use this device class for fans that cool your home.

garagedoor.label: Garage door
garagedoor.description: Use this device class for garage doors, usually together with the `garagedoor_closed` capability.

heater.label: Heater
heater.description: Use this device class for heaters, that warm your home.

homealarm.label: Home Security
homealarm.description: Use this device class for home alarm systems.

kettle.label: Kettle
kettle.description: Use this device class for kettle devices, that can heat water.

light.label: Light
light.description: Use this device class for lights, usually together with the `onoff`, `dim` and `light_*` capabilities.

lock.label: Lock
lock.description: Use this device class for lock devices, usually together with the `locked` and `lock_mode` capabilities.

other.label: Other
other.description: Use this device class for devices that do not fit any other device class.

remote.label: Remote
remote.description: Use this device class for (TV/Sunblind/Keyfob etc.) remotes.

sensor.label: Sensor
sensor.description: Use this device class for sensors, e.g. a contact or motion sensor.

socket.label: Wall Plug
socket.description: Use this device class for sockets (built-in or plug-in socket switches). When adding the `choose_slave` pair template, the user is presented a `What's plugged in?` question.

speaker.label: Speaker
speaker.description: Use this device class for devices that can play music, usually together with the `speaker_*` capabilities.

solarpanel.label: Solar Panel
solarpanel.description: Use this device class for solar panels.

sunshade.label: Sunshade
sunshade.description: Use this device class for sunshades (window coverings against the sun).

thermostat.label: Thermostat
thermostat.description: Use this device class for thermostats, either for the entire home or radiator-mounted, usually together with the `measure_temperature`, `target_temperature` and `thermostat_mode` capabilities.

tv.label: TV
tv.description: Use this device class for TVs.

vacuumcleaner.label: Vacuum Cleaner
vacuumcleaner.description: Use this device class for vacuum cleaners, usually together with the `vacuumcleaner_state` capability.

windowcoverings.label: Window Coverings
windowcoverings.description: Use this device class for window coverings, when the `curtains`, `blinds` or `sunshade` device class doesn't apply.
